arcana_sample_1.name: Bolster Griffon Cavalry
arcana_sample_1.body: Requires: 2 Fighters (orange), 2 Wizards (purple), 2 Gold. Reward: 6 VP.
arcana_sample_1.details: Typical Arcana quest requiring Wizards plus support.

arcana_sample_2.name: Establish Harper Safe House
arcana_sample_2.details: Higher VP Arcana quest with heavy Wizard requirement.

commerce_sample_1.name: Place a Sleeper Agent in Skullport
commerce_sample_1.body: Requires: 2 Rogues (black), 4 Gold. Reward: 7 VP + 2 Intrigue cards.
commerce_sample_1.details: Commerce quests often require gold and provide extra resources.

commerce_sample_2.name: Produce a Miracle for the Masses
commerce_sample_2.body: Requires: 1 Cleric (white), 1 Rogue (black), 2 Gold. Reward: 4 VP + 6 Gold.
commerce_sample_2.details: Lower VP but provides significant gold return.

piety_sample_1.name: Convert a Noble to Lathander
piety_sample_1.body: Requires: 2 Clerics (white), 1 Fighter (orange). Reward: 5 VP + 2 Gold.
piety_sample_1.details: Typical Piety quest with Cleric focus.

piety_sample_2.name: Safeguard Eltorchul Mage
piety_sample_2.details: High VP Piety quest requiring significant Cleric investment.

skullduggery_sample_1.name: Steal Spellbook from Silverhand
skullduggery_sample_1.details: Typical Skullduggery quest with heavy Rogue requirement.

skullduggery_sample_2.name: Infiltrate Builder's Hall
skullduggery_sample_2.body: Requires: 2 Rogues (black), 2 Gold. Reward: 6 VP + free Building purchase.
skullduggery_sample_2.details: Provides VP plus ability to claim a Building.

warfare_sample_1.name: Defend the Tower of Luck
warfare_sample_1.details: Typical Warfare quest with Fighter focus.

warfare_sample_2.name: Recruit Lieutenant
warfare_sample_2.body: Requires: 2 Fighters (orange), 2 Gold. Reward: 4 VP + Lieutenant token (permanent extra Agent).
warfare_sample_2.details: PLOT QUEST: Provides a permanent extra Agent for the rest of the game.
warfare_sample_2.extra: Type: Warfare (red) | PLOT QUEST | Difficulty: Easy

plot_quest_sample.name: Research Chronomancy
plot_quest_sample.body: Requires: 2 Wizards (purple), 2 Gold. Reward: 3 VP. ONGOING: Once per round, you may take 1 Wizard from the supply.
plot_quest_sample.details: PLOT QUEST: Low VP but provides ongoing Wizard income for the rest of the game.
plot_quest_sample.extra: Type: Arcana (blue) | PLOT QUEST | Difficulty: Easy

mandatory_quest_sample.name: Repel Seawraith Invaders
mandatory_quest_sample.body: Requires: 1 Fighter (orange), 1 Cleric (white). Reward: 2 VP. MANDATORY: Must complete before any other Quest.
mandatory_quest_sample.details: MANDATORY QUEST: Given via Intrigue card. Blocks other quest completion until done.
mandatory_quest_sample.extra: Type: Warfare (red) | MANDATORY | Difficulty: Easy but disruptive
